org.apache.polygene.spi.serialization

Class AbstractSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.polygene.spi.serialization.AbstractSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBinarySerializer, AbstractTextSerializer

    public abstract class AbstractSerializer
extends Object
implements Serializer
    Base Serializer. Provides default implementations for convenience API methods. See AbstractDeserializer.
